item.title: Configuring Nested Styled Components
item.description: Let’s consider a component that looks something like this (ignoring the obvious issues with the form itself): const Form = styled.form` padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid black; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 2rem; `; const Input = styled.input` border-radius: 5px; padding: 1rem; `; const InformationForm: FC = () => { return ( <Form> <Input name="firstName" /> <Input name="lastName" /> </Form> ); }; export default InformationForm; I build out my feature like this and I’m on my way.
